select login, centerid from doctor where id in (2026, 10100, 2012, 2021, 2017, 2027, 2016, 2008, 2010, 2025, 2018, 2020, 2024, 2013, 2015, 2019, 2022, 2011, 2023, 2306, 2318, 2751, 2995, 2993, 2009, 2014, 2994, 10098)

select * from job where doctorid in (2026, 10100, 2012, 2021, 2017, 2027, 2016, 2008, 2010, 2025, 2018, 2020, 2024, 2013, 2015, 2019, 2022, 2011, 2023, 2306, 2318, 2751, 2995, 2993, 2009, 2014, 2994, 10098) order by id desc limit 100;
